synopsis.p: Convert an XML image representation to an extended Portable PixMap (PPMX) image.

description.p: Convert an XML image representation to an extended Portable PixMap (PPMX) image.
The PPMX image file is written to standard output.
Extended Portable PixMap files are an enhanced form of PPM files that include an extra alpha channel mask.

example.description: Convert XML file inp.xml to the PPMX file out.ppmx.
